attributes.action: Quarentine for travellers to the UK is devastating the travel industry.
attributes.additional_details: Because a two weeks quarentine for travellers to the UK could be devastating for the travel industry. I know there are different ways to filter travellers.
attributes.background: The parlement should be debating it.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/320329
